name: Combat Warfare Online (Reyes_J)
description:
Hi there! My name is Juan, and I have created a small third person game prototype using assets from the market stores.  The idea of the game is that you will be able to create team's squads like Seal team, ground team and air team to fight real players on a large-scale map. 

Inspired by Conflit Desert storm and tom clancy advanced warfighter 

Play with Bots or find real players 

example: 

Team A will defend a location and Team B has to attack the defended location your team will have different roles to play like a squad will be operating a submarine or a Spy plane monitoring the sky and giving support to the ground team etc...

! You may have to extract the files from the folder!

! important!

To find servers join my Discord

Discord Server link

https://discord.gg/arfmkWgx28
